GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.12.2
GSD.description:
net: qrtr: Avoid potential use after free in MHI send

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.2 by commit 03c649dee8b1eb5600212a249542a70f47a5ab40, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 6e728f321393b1fce9e1c2c3e55f9f7c15991321. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: qrtr: Avoid potential use after free in MHI send
